text: Iman Budhi Santosa (28 March 1948 - 10 December 2020), commonly known as IBS, was an Indonesian author. Many of his poems and novels were based on Javanese cultural. He published Ziarah Tanah Jawa ("Pilgrimage to the Land of Java"), a collection of poems written between 2006 and 2012, in 2013. Santosa died on 10 December 2020 in Yogyakarta, Indonesia from a heart attack, aged 72.Sastrawan Iman Budhi Santosa Tutup Usia ==Works== * Tiga Bayangan (poetry anthology; 1970) * Ranjang Tiga Bunga (novel; 1975) * Barong Kertapati (novel; 1976) * Dunia Semata Wayang (poetry; 1996) * Kalimantang (short story collection; 2003) * Matahari-Matahari Kecil (poetry; 2004) * Perempuan Panggung (novel; 2007) * Ziara Tanah Jawa (poetry; 2013) * Sesanti Tedhak Siti (geguritan; 2015) ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indonesian writers Category:Asian novelists Category:Indonesian poets
title: Iman Budhi Santosa
